definition.name: finite_free_convolution
definition.definition: For p, q in P_n with coefficient vectors (a_0,...,a_n), (b_0,...,b_n) where a_0=b_0=1, define r = p âŠž_n q by r(x) = sum_{k=0}^n c_k x^{n-k} where c_k = sum_{i+j=k} [(n-i)!(n-j)! / (n!(n-k)!)] a_i b_j. This is the Marcus-Spielman-Srivastava (MSS) convolution.
